description: This aptly named restaurant (At Nino’s house) is situated in chef Nino Di Costanzo’s own house in a residential district amid the hills of Ischia. Once over the threshold, you make your way ...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Garden or park, Interesting wine list, Restaurant offering vegetarian menus
